title: Defense Dept. releases video of tomahawk missile launch
text:
Defense Dept. releases video of tomahawk missile launch 5:49am IST - 01:04 
The DOD released video on Saturday it said showed a tomahawk missile launching from a submarine in the Mediterranean as part of ''a multi-national strike operation against the Syrian government,'' as well as a B-1 Bomber taking-off from an undisclosed location. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
